character.statement: Why have you asked me here?
I thought Binary Bard was lost in deep space. How did he end up here?
Captain Crawfish can't do much blogging from in there.
Once a thief, always a thief. The Black Widow is stealing forty winks!
Dr. Hare doesn't look so threatening now. He almost looks cute!
But how do we do that?
Welcome! I'm so glad you could make it.
You are about to participate in the most important scientific experiment the world has ever known.
character.statment: What are you waiting for, collect all the totems!
character.statement: Such power! This is the most concentrated source of evil in the history of Poptropica.
Destroy? Oh, no... I've got other plans!
You are perfectly safe. Each of these fiends is fast asleep...
I believe that deep inside the mind of each of these villains is a totem representing the source of their evil. If we remove the totems, we remove the evil!
That's where you come in. You're going to infiltrate their dreams and bring back those totems!
When you're ready, step into the dream machine and get started!
Behold! It is I, Zeus! With these four objects, I will finally rule all of Poptropica!
